default: (a) {@item chain mail|phb} or (b) {@item leather armor|phb}, {@item longbow|phb}, and {@item arrows (20)|phb|20 arrows}
(a) a {@filter martial weapon|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=martial weapon} and a {@item shield|phb} or (b) two {@filter martial weapons|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=martial weapon}
(a) a {@item light crossbow|phb} and {@item crossbow bolts (20)|phb|20 bolts} or (b) two {@item handaxe|phb|handaxes}
(a) a {@item dungeoneer's pack|phb} or (b) an {@item explorer's pack|phb}

fluff.name: Fighter
entries: 一个穿着铿锵有力的板甲的人类在她面前举着她的盾牌，向大批的地精跑去。她身后的一个精灵，身穿镶钉皮甲，用他精致的弓箭向地精们射去。旁边的半兽人喊着命令，帮助这两个战斗人员协调他们的攻击，以获得最佳优势。
一个穿着链甲的矮人将他的盾牌插在食人魔的棍子和他的同伴之间，将致命的一击打到一边。他的同伴，一个身穿鳞甲的半精灵，挥舞着两把弯刀打出了一个刺眼的旋涡，她绕着食人魔转，寻找它防御的盲点。
一个角斗士在竞技场上为运动而战，他是一个使用三叉戟和网的高手，熟练地推翻敌人，让他们在观众的欢呼声中移动，也是他自己的战术优势。他的对手的剑在她发出闪电击打他之前的一瞬间发出了蓝光。
所有这些英雄都是战士，也许是《龙与地下城》世界中最多样化的一类角色。探险的骑士、征服的霸主、皇室的冠军、精锐的步兵、坚韧的雇佣兵和强盗之王--作为战士，他们都对武器和盔甲有着无与伦比的掌握，并对战斗技巧有着全面的了解。他们对死亡非常熟悉，既能将其击倒，又能轻蔑地盯着它。

entries.name: Well-Rounded Specialists
entries: 战士们学习所有战斗风格的基础知识。每个战士都能挥舞斧头，用剑杆击剑，挥舞长剑或大剑，使用弓箭，甚至能在某种程度上熟练地将敌人困在网中。同样地，战士也善于使用盾牌和各种形式的盔甲。除了这种基本的熟悉程度之外，每个战士都擅长于某种战斗风格。有些人专注于射箭，有些人同时使用两种武器作战，有些人则用魔法来增强他们的武术技能。这种广泛的综合能力和广泛的专业化的结合，使战士们在战场上和地牢里都是卓越的战斗人员。

entries.name: Trained for Danger
entries: 不是每一个城市守望者、乡村民兵或女王军队的成员都是战士。这些部队中的大多数是相对没有受过训练的士兵，只有最基本的战斗知识。老兵、军官、训练有素的保镖、专职骑士和类似的人物都是战士。
有些战士感到被吸引来使用他们作为冒险家的训练。深入地牢、杀死怪物和其他在冒险者中常见的危险工作是战士的第二天性，与他或她留下的生活没有什么不同。也许有更大的风险，但也有更大的回报--例如，在城市观察中很少有战士有机会发现一把神奇的焰舌剑。

entries.name: Creating a Fighter
entries: As you build your fighter, think about two related elements of your character's background: Where did you get your combat training, and what set you apart from the mundane warriors around you? Were you particularly ruthless? Did you get extra help from a mentor, perhaps because of your exceptional dedication? What drove you to this training in the first place? A threat to your homeland, a thirst for revenge, or a need to prove yourself might all have been factors.
你可能在贵族的军队或地方民兵中接受过正式的训练。也许你在战争学院受训，学习战略、战术和军事历史。或者你可能是自学成才--没有经过打磨，但经过良好的测试。你拿起剑是为了摆脱农场生活的局限性，还是在遵循一个自豪的家族传统？你的武器和盔甲是从哪里获得的？它们可能是军方发行的或家族的传家宝，也可能是你节衣缩食多年买来的。你的武器现在是你最重要的财产之一，是你和死亡的拥抱之间唯一的东西。

entries.name: Quick Build
entries: You can make a fighter quickly by following these suggestions. First, make Strength or Dexterity your highest ability score, depending on whether you want to focus on melee weapons or on archery (or finesse weapons). Your next-highest score should be Constitution, or Intelligence if you plan to adopt the Eldritch Knight martial archetype. Second, choose the {@background soldier} background.
你们都说完了就告诉我吧。

Of all the adventurers in the worlds of D&D, the fighter is perhaps the greatest paradox. On the one hand, a singular feature of the class is that no two fighters ply their craft in quite the same way; their weapons, armor, and tactics differ across a vast spectrum. On the other hand, regardless of the tools and methods one uses, at the heart of every fighter's motivation lies the same basic truth: it is better to wound than to be wounded.
虽然有些冒险战士冒着生命危险为荣誉或财宝而战，但其他人主要关心的是他人的福利。他们把社会、村庄或团体的福祉看得比自己的安全更重要。即使有黄金在手，对大多数战士来说，真正的回报来自于将敌人送上绝路。
下面的章节提供了为你的战士角色增加一点深度和一些个人修饰的方法。

entries.name: Heraldic Sign
entries: 战士们通常是为了某种原因而战斗。有些人代表被怪物围困的王国而战，有些人则只为个人荣誉而战。无论是哪种情况，战士通常都会展示一个代表该事业的纹章标志，要么采用一个国家或王室的标志，要么创造一个代表自我利益的纹章。
你的角色可能隶属于一个组织或一个事业，因此可能已经在某种旗帜下旅行。如果不是这种情况，可以考虑设计一个象征你本性的一个方面的预示牌，或者说你认为你在这个世界上的目的。

entries.caption: Heraldic Signs
rows: 绿地上一条猖獗的金龙，代表着英勇和对财富的追求
风暴巨人的拳头在风暴云前攥着闪电，象征着愤怒和力量
城堡门前的交叉大剑，象征着城市或王国的防御。
一个有匕首穿过的头骨，代表你给你的敌人带来的厄运。
火圈中的凤凰，表达了一种不屈不挠的精神
黑色背景上的横向剑刃下的三滴血，象征着你发誓要杀死的三个敌人

entries.name: Instructor
entries: 有些战士是天生的战斗员，有在战斗中生存的天赋。其他人则是在成长期通过在军队或其他一些武术组织中度过的时间，在团体领导人的教导下学会了他们战斗力的基本知识。
第三种类型的战士来自于那些从有成就的老手那里接受一对一指导的人的行列。这位教官过去，或者现在仍然精通与学生背景有关的某一方面的战斗。
如果你决定你的角色有一个单独的教官，这个人的专长是什么？你是模仿教官的战斗方式，还是接受了教官的教诲并将其改编为自己的目的？

entries.caption: Instructor
rows: 角斗士。你的教官是在竞技场上为自由而战的奴隶，或者是自愿选择角斗士生活以赚取金钱和名声的人。
军队。你的培训师曾与一群士兵一起服役，对团队工作有很多了解。
城市观察。人群控制和维持和平是你们教官的专长。
部落战士。你的教官在一个部落里长大，在那里为自己的生命而战几乎是每天都在发生的事情。
街头霸王。你的训练师擅长城市作战，将近距离工作与沉默和效率相结合。
武器大师。你的导师通过传授如何最有效地挥舞武器的高度专业的知识，帮助你与你选择的武器融为一体。

entries.name: Style
entries: 许多战士通过采用和完善一种特定的战斗风格或方法使自己从同龄人中脱颖而出。虽然这种风格可能是拳手个性的自然流露，但情况并不总是这样--一个人对世界的态度不一定决定了他在生命攸关的时候如何操作。
你是否有一种反映你人生观的战斗风格，或者当你拔出武器时，你内心的其他东西被释放出来？

entries.caption: Style
rows: 优雅。你的动作精确优雅，完全控制，从不使用超过你需要的能量。
残暴的。你的攻击像锤子一样砸下来，意在劈开骨头或让血液飞溅。
狡猾。你在适当的时候飞快地进行攻击，并使用小规模的战术来使胜算向你倾斜。
不费吹灰之力。在战斗中，你很少出汗，也很少表现出坚毅的表情以外的东西。
精力充沛。在战斗中你会唱歌和大笑，因为你的精神在飞升。当你面前有敌人，手中有武器时，你是最快乐的。
阴险。你在战斗时皱眉冷笑，你喜欢在击败敌人时嘲弄他们。

classFeature.name: Fighting Style
entries: 你采用一种特殊的战斗风格作为你的专长。从以下选项中选择一个。你不能多次选择相同的格斗风格，即使你可以再次选择。

classFeature.name: Second Wind
entries: You have a limited well of stamina that you can draw on to protect yourself from harm. On your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d10} + your fighter level.
一旦你使用这个功能，你必须完成一个短期或长期的休息才能再次使用。

classFeature.name: Action Surge
entries: 从第2级开始，你可以在片刻间超越自己的正常极限。在你的回合中，你可以采取一个额外的行动。
一旦你使用了这个功能，你必须完成一个短期或长期的休息才能再次使用它。从17级开始，你可以在休息前使用它两次，但在同一回合只能使用一次。

classFeature.name: Martial Archetype
entries: 在3级的时候，你从现有的列表中选择一个原型，在你的战斗风格和技巧中努力模仿。你选择的原型在3级时赋予你特性，在7级、10级、15级和18级时再次赋予你特性。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到四级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
If your DM allows the use of feats, you may instead take a {@5etools feat|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Martial Versatility
entries: {@i 4th-level fighter {@variantrule optional class features|tce|optional feature}}
每当你在这个等级中达到授予能力值提高功能的等级时，你可以做以下一件事，因为你转移了你武术练习的重点。

items: Replace a {@filter fighting style|optionalfeatures|feature type=FS:F} you know with another fighting style available to fighters.

If you know any {@filter maneuvers|optionalfeatures|feature type=MV:B} from the {@class fighter|phb|Battle Master|Battle Master|phb|2-0} archetype, you can replace one maneuver you know with a different maneuver.

classFeature.name: Extra Attack
entries: Beginning at 5th level, you can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the {@action Attack} action on your turn.
当你在这个等级达到11级时，攻击次数增加到3次，当你在这个等级达到20级时增加到4次。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到6级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
If your DM allows the use of feats, you may instead take a {@5etools feat|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Martial Archetype feature
entries: 在7级时，你获得一个由你的武学原型赋予的特性。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到8级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
If your DM allows the use of feats, you may instead take a {@5etools feat|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Indomitable
entries: 从第9级开始，你可以重新掷出你失败的救赎。如果你这样做了，你必须使用新的投掷方法，并且在你完成长时间休息之前，你不能再次使用这个功能。
你可以在13级开始的长时间休息之间使用这个功能两次，在17级开始的长时间休息之间使用三次。

classFeature.name: Martial Archetype feature
entries: 在10级时，你获得一个由你的武学原型赋予的功能。

classFeature.name: Extra Attack (2)
entries: At 11th level, you can attack three times whenever you take the {@action Attack} action on your turn.

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到12级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
If your DM allows the use of feats, you may instead take a {@5etools feat|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Indomitable (two uses)
entries: 在13级时，你可以在长时间休息之间使用不屈不挠两次。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到14级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
If your DM allows the use of feats, you may instead take a {@5etools feat|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Martial Archetype feature
entries: 在15级时，你获得一个由你的武学原型赋予的功能。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到16级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
If your DM allows the use of feats, you may instead take a {@5etools feat|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Action Surge (two uses)
entries: 17级时，你可以在休息前使用行动突进两次，但在同一回合只能使用一次。

classFeature.name: Indomitable (three uses)
entries: 17级时，你可以在长时间休息之间使用不屈不挠三次。

classFeature.name: Martial Archetype feature
entries: 在18级时，你获得一个由你的武学原型赋予的功能。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到19级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
If your DM allows the use of feats, you may instead take a {@5etools feat|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Extra Attack (3)
entries: At 20th level, you can attack four times whenever you take the {@action Attack} action on your turn.

subclassFeature.name: Echo Knight
entries: 回声骑士是克莱恩王朝神秘而令人畏惧的前线战士，他掌握了使用杜纳米斯召唤未实现的时间线的消逝阴影来帮助他们作战的艺术。他们被自己的力量的回声所包围，作为一个循环的影子和打击的蜂群冲入战场。

subclassFeature.name: Manifest Echo
entries: {@i 3rd-level Echo Knight feature}

You can use a bonus action to magically manifest an echo of yourself in an unoccupied space you can see within 15 feet of you. This echo is a magical, translucent, gray image of you that lasts until it is destroyed, until you dismiss it as a bonus action, until you manifest another echo, or until you're {@condition incapacitated}.

Your echo has AC 14 + your proficiency bonus, 1 hit point, and immunity to all conditions. If it has to make a saving throw, it uses your saving throw bonus for the roll. It is the same size as you, and it occupies its space. On your turn, you can mentally command the echo to move up to 30 feet in any direction (no action required). If your echo is ever more than 30 feet from you at the end of your turn, it is destroyed.
你可以通过以下方式使用回声。

items: 作为一个额外的动作，你可以传送，以15英尺的移动距离为代价，与你的回声进行神奇的交换，而不管你们之间的距离如何。
When you take the {@action Attack} action on your turn, any attack you make with that action can originate from your space or the echo's space. You make this choice for each attack.
当你能看到的在你的回音5英尺范围内的生物从它身边移动至少5英尺时，你可以用你的反应对该生物进行一次机会攻击，就像你在回音的空间里一样。

subclassFeature.name: Unleash Incarnation
entries: {@i 3rd-level Echo Knight feature}
You can heighten your echo's fury. Whenever you take the {@action Attack} action, you can make one additional melee attack from the echo's position.
你可以使用这个功能的次数等于你的体质修正值（最少一次）。当你完成长时间的休息时，你会重新获得所有已消耗的使用次数。

subclassFeature.name: Echo Avatar
entries: {@i 7th-level Echo Knight feature}

You can temporarily transfer your consciousness to your echo. As an action, you can see through your echo's eyes and hear through its ears. During this time, you are {@condition deafened} and {@condition blinded}. You can sustain this effect for up to 10 minutes, and you can end it at any time (requires no action). While your echo is being used in this way, it can be up to 1,000 feet away from you without being destroyed.

subclassFeature.name: Shadow Martyr
entries: {@i 10th-level Echo Knight feature}
你可以让你的回音在针对另一个你能看到的生物的攻击面前投掷自己。在做出攻击卷之前，你可以用你的反应将回音传送到目标生物5英尺内的一个无人空间。触发反应的攻击卷将针对你的回音进行。
一旦你使用了这个功能，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个短期或长期的休息。

subclassFeature.name: Reclaim Potential
entries: {@i 15th-level Echo Knight feature}

You've learned to absorb the fleeting magic of your echo. When an echo of yours is destroyed by taking damage, you can gain a number of temporary hit points equal to {@dice 2d6} + your Constitution modifier, provided you don't already have temporary hit points.
你可以使用这个功能的次数等于你的体质修正值（最少一次）。当你完成长时间的休息时，你会重新获得所有已消耗的使用次数。

subclassFeature.name: Legion of One
entries: {@i 18th-level Echo Knight feature}
你可以使用一个额外的动作，用你的显化回声功能创造两个回声，而且这些回声可以共存。如果你试图创造第三个回声，那么之前的两个回声就会被摧毁。你可以从一个回声的位置做的任何事情都可以从另一个回声的位置做。
此外，当你掷出主动权并没有使用你的 "释放化身 "功能时，你会重新获得该功能的一次使用权。

subclassFeature.name: Scofflaw
entries: A fighter who hits hard and fights dirty, the Scofflaw balks at the ideals of honor and tradition, doing what they need to survive. Rules are made to be broken, and the Scofflaw extends this logic to their fighting style. Using every trick at their disposal to gain the upper hand against their foes, the Scofflaw cows their enemy into submission, or overwhelms their defenses with a single cheap shot.

Scofflaws eventually trust their notorious reputation to do much of the work for them, gaining the ability to cause foes to quake with a single threat. Scofflaws are a diverse bunch that run the gamut from graceful yet deadly knaves to bruiser thugs. What ties them together is their belief that there's no such thing as a bad win.

entries.name: Bonus Proficiency
entries: When you choose this Martial Archetype at 3rd level, you gain proficiency in one of the following skills of your choice: {@skill Deception}, {@skill Insight}, {@skill Intimidation}, {@skill Sleight of Hand}, or {@skill Stealth}. Alternatively, you may learn {@class rogue|phb|Thieves' Cant||phb|Thieves' Cant 1}.

entries.name: Intimidating Banter
entries: At 3rd level, you are adept at integrating insults and barbs into your fighting style. So long as you are in combat, you may choose to use Strength or Dexterity to make Charisma ability checks.

entries.name: Brutal Brawler
entries: At 3rd level, your tavernside scuffles have honed your ability to deal damage with just about anything that's handy. You have proficiency with improvised weapons, and treat any improvised weapon you handle as if it has the finesse quality.

Additionally, whenever you hit with an improvised weapon, you may spend a bonus action to break it over your opponent. Doing this destroys the weapon, but deals the maximum number each of the weapon's damage dice could deal to the target. Any additional dice added to the attack's damage roll are not affected by this ability.

At 10th level, the improvised weapons you wield become even more lethal in your hands. When you spend your bonus action to break an improvised weapon over your opponent, add an additional {@damage 2d6} to the weapon's base damage dice.
At 18th level, you have advantage on attacks you make with improvised weapons.

subclassFeature.name: Misdirection
entries: At 7th level, you are adept at using words and gestures to taunt or fake-out your opponent, turning their lack of composure against them. This allows you to goad your foe into swinging in ways that can cause them to strike their allies, or which leave them open to a counterattack. As a bonus action you can misdirect an opponent within 5 feet of you. The target must succeed on an Intelligence saving throw against a DC equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Strength or Dexterity modifier. On a failure, they must spend their reaction to attack a creature of your choice within 5 feet of them. If no other creatures are present within 5 feet of them, they waste their reaction attacking the air where you once were.
In order for you to misdirect a creature in this way they must be able to see, hear, or otherwise be able to understand you.

subclassFeature.name: Blindside
entries: At 10th level, you are truly skilled at exploiting the openings you create in combat, hitting off-guard opponents with precise blows that are swift and deadly. You may use this technique against any creature that hasn't yet taken a turn in combat, or who you have successfully misdirected this turn. You may also apply this technique to any attack roll you make with advantage. On a hit, you exploit an opening in the target's defenses, dealing an extra {@damage 5d6} points of damage. Once you use this ability, you can't use it again until you have taken a short or long rest.
At 15th level, the damage dealt by your blindside increases to {@damage 7d6}.
At 18th level the damage dealt by your blindside increases to {@damage 9d6}. If you have no uses of this ability at the beginning of combat on your turn, you regain one use of it.

subclassFeature.name: Infamy
entries: At 15th level, your reputation precedes you, making it easy for you to strike fear into the hearts of anyone foolish enough to oppose you. As part of your {@action Attack} action, you can utter deadly threats to a single target within 30 feet of you, causing them to become {@condition frightened} of you for 1 minute on a failed Wisdom saving throw. An affected target may repeat this saving throw at the end of each of their turns, ending the effect on a success. The DC for this saving throw is 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Strength or Dexterity modifier. A creature who has witnessed or heard tales of your ruthlessness makes this saving throw with disadvantage.
In order for you to use this feature, a creature must be able to see, hear, or otherwise be able to understand you.

subclassFeature.name: Two For Flinching
entries: At 18th level, you have perfected the art of exploiting your opponent's weakness. Whenever you take the attack action against an opponent you have successfully misdirected this turn, or an opponent that is afflicted by a {@book condition|PHB|11}, you may make one additional attack against that opponent. You may only use this feature once per round.

subclassFeature.name: Battle Master
entries: 那些模仿典型的战斗大师的人采用了世代相传的武术技术。对战斗大师来说，战斗是一个学术领域，有时包括战斗以外的科目，如武器制造和书法。并非每个战士都能吸收战斗大师原型所反映的历史、理论和艺术方面的课程，但那些吸收了的战士都是具有丰富技能和知识的全面战士。

subclassFeature.name: Combat Superiority
entries: 当你在3级选择这个原型时，你会学习由特殊骰子推动的演习，这些骰子被称为优势骰子。

entries.name: Maneuvers
entries: 你学习三种自选动作，这些动作在下面的 "动作 "中列出。许多演习以某种方式加强攻击。你每次攻击只能使用一种演习。
你在第7、第10和第15级的时候会额外学习两个你选择的演习。每次你学习新的动作时，你也可以用一个不同的动作取代你所知道的一个动作。

entries.name: Superiority Dice
entries: You have four superiority dice, which are {@dice d8}s. A superiority die is expended when you use it. You regain all of your expended superiority dice when you finish a short or long rest.
你在7级时获得另一个优势模子，在15级时再获得一个。

entries.name: Saving Throws
entries: 你的某些演习需要你的目标做出一个蓄力动作来抵抗演习的效果。蓄力动作的计算方式如下。

subclassFeature.name: Maneuver Options
entries: {@i 3rd-level fighter {@variantrule optional class features|tce|optional feature}}

If you have access to maneuvers, the following maneuvers are added to the list of options available to you. Maneuvers are available to Battle Masters but also to characters who have a special feature like the {@optfeature Superior Technique|TCE} fighting style or the {@feat Martial Adept} feat.

subclassFeature.name: Maneuvers
entries: 这些动作是按字母顺序排列的。

subclassFeature.name: Student of War
entries: At 3rd level, you gain proficiency with one type of {@filter artisan's tools|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=artisan's tools} of your choice.

subclassFeature.name: Additional Maneuvers
entries: 在第7级时，你可以学习两个额外的自选动作。

subclassFeature.name: Additional Superiority Die
entries: 你在第七级时获得另一个优势模子。

subclassFeature.name: Know Your Enemy
entries: If you spend at least 1 minute observing or interacting with another creature outside combat, you can learn certain information about its capabilities compared to your own. The DM tells you if the creature is your equal, superior, or inferior in regard to two of the following characteristics of your choice:

items: 班级总水平（如果有的话）
战斗机的等级（如果有的话）

subclassFeature.name: Additional Maneuvers
entries: 在10级时，你可以额外学习两种你选择的机动性。

subclassFeature.name: Improved Combat Superiority (d10)
entries: At 10th level, your superiority dice turn into {@dice d10}s.

subclassFeature.name: Additional Maneuvers
entries: 在15级时，你可以额外学习两种你选择的机动性。

subclassFeature.name: Additional Superiority Die
entries: 你在15级时获得另一个优势模子。

subclassFeature.name: Relentless
entries: 从15级开始，当你掷出主动权并且没有剩余的优越性骰子时，你会重新获得1个优越性骰子。

subclassFeature.name: Improved Combat Superiority (d12)
entries: At 18th level, your superiority dice turn into {@dice d12}s.

subclassFeature.name: Champion
entries: 冠军的原型专注于发展原始的身体力量，使之达到致命的完美。那些以这一原型为榜样的人将严格的训练与卓越的体能结合起来，以造成破坏性的打击。

subclassFeature.name: Improved Critical
entries: 从你在3级时选择这个原型开始，你的武器攻击在掷出19或20的时候可以获得关键打击。

subclassFeature.name: Remarkable Athlete
entries: 从第七级开始，你可以在你做的任何没有使用你的熟练度加分的力量、灵巧或体质检查中加入你的熟练度加分的一半（取整）。
此外，当你进行跑步跳远时，你能覆盖的距离会增加等于你的力量修正值的英尺数。

subclassFeature.name: Additional Fighting Style
entries: 在10级时，你可以从战斗风格类特征中选择第二个选项。

subclassFeature.name: Superior Critical
entries: 从15级开始，你的武器攻击在掷出18-20的情况下可以获得关键打击。

subclassFeature.name: Survivor
entries: 在18级时，你在战斗中达到了复原力的顶峰。在你的每个回合开始时，如果你剩下的命中率不超过一半，你会重新获得相当于5+你的体质修正值的命中率。如果你的命中率为0，你就不会获得这个好处。

subclassFeature.name: Eldritch Knight
entries: 典型的埃尔德里奇骑士结合了所有战士常见的武术技巧和对魔法的仔细研究。埃尔德里奇骑士使用的魔法技术类似于魔法师所练习的。他们的研究重点是八大魔法流派中的两个--变形术和召唤术。咒语能在战斗中为长生骑士提供额外的保护，而召唤法术能同时对许多敌人造成伤害，扩大战士的战斗范围。这些骑士学习的法术数量相对较少，他们把这些法术记在脑子里而不是保存在法术书里。

subclassFeature.name: Spellcasting
entries: When you reach 3rd level, you augment your martial prowess with the ability to cast spells. See {@book chapter 10|PHB|10} for the general rules of spellcasting and {@book chapter 11|PHB|11} for the {@filter wizard spell list|spells|class=wizard}.

entries.name: Cantrips
entries: You learn two cantrips of your choice from the {@filter wizard spell list|spells|class=wizard}. You learn an additional wizard cantrip of your choice at 10th level.

entries.name: Spell Slots
entries: The Eldritch Knight Spellcasting table shows how many spell slots you have to cast your {@filter wizard spells|spells|class=wizard} of 1st level and higher. To cast one of these spells, you must expend a slot of the spell's level or higher. You regain all expended spell slots when you finish a long rest.
For example, if you know the 1st-level spell {@spell shield} and have a 1st-level and a 2nd-level spell slot available, you can cast {@spell shield} using either slot.

entries.name: Spells Known of 1st-Level and Higher
entries: 你会三个自选的一级巫师法术，其中两个必须从巫师法术列表中的堕落和召唤法术中选择。
埃尔德里奇骑士法术表的 "已知法术 "一栏显示了你何时学会了更多1级或以上的巫师法术。每个法术都必须是你选择的咒语或召唤法术，并且必须是你有法术槽的等级。例如，当你在这个等级中达到7级时，你可以学习一个1级或2级的新法术。
你在8级、14级和20级学到的法术可以来自任何魔法流派。
每当你在这个等级中获得一个等级，你可以用你在巫师法术列表中选择的另一个法术来替换你所知道的一个巫师法术。新的法术必须是你有法术槽的等级，而且必须是咒语或召唤法术，除非你替换的是你在3、8、14或20级时从任何魔法流派获得的法术。

entries.name: Spellcasting Ability
entries: Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for your wizard spells, since you learn your spells through study and memorization. You use your Intelligence whenever a spell refers to your spellcasting ability. In addition, you use your Intelligence modifier when setting the saving throw DC for a wizard spell you cast and when making an attack roll with one.

subclassFeature.name: Weapon Bond
entries: 在3级时，你学习一种仪式，在你和一件武器之间建立一种神奇的联系。你在1小时内完成这个仪式，可以在短暂的休息中完成。在整个仪式过程中，武器必须在你伸手可及的范围内，在仪式结束时，你会接触到武器并建立起纽带。

Once you have bonded a weapon to yourself, you can't be disarmed of that weapon unless you are {@condition incapacitated}. If it is on the same plane of existence, you can summon that weapon as a bonus action on your turn, causing it to teleport instantly to your hand.
你最多可以拥有两把绑定的武器，但每次只能用你的额外行动召唤一把。如果你试图与第三把武器结合，你必须与另外两把武器中的一把解除结合。

subclassFeature.name: War Magic
entries: 从第七级开始，当你用行动施展咒语时，你可以将一次武器攻击作为奖励行动。

subclassFeature.name: Eldritch Strike
entries: 在10级时，你学会了如何使你的武器攻击削弱生物对你的法术的抵抗力。当你用武器攻击击中一个生物时，该生物在下一回合结束前对你施放的法术进行下一次蓄力时将处于不利地位。

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Charge
entries: 在15级时，你获得了在使用行动突进时传送到你能看到的无人空间的能力，最多可以传送30英尺。你可以在额外行动之前或之后进行传送。

subclassFeature.name: Improved War Magic
entries: 从18级开始，当你用行动施法时，你可以将一次武器攻击作为奖励行动。

subclassFeature.name: Purple Dragon Knight (Banneret)
entries: 紫龙骑士是来自科米尔王国的战士。他们誓死保护王室，与王国边界以外的邪恶作斗争。他们的任务是以骑士的身份游荡在这片土地上，依靠他们的判断力、勇气和忠诚度来指导他们击败恶人。
紫龙骑士通过在战斗中的英勇事迹来激励他人的伟大精神。仅仅一个骑士出现在一个小村庄，就足以让一些兽人和强盗寻找更容易的猎物。一个孤独的骑士是一个熟练的战士，但一个骑士带领一队盟友，甚至可以把装备最差的民兵变成一个凶猛的战队。
骑士更喜欢通过行动而不是语言来领导。当骑士带头进攻时，骑士的行动可以唤醒盟友的勇气和信念的储备，而他们从未怀疑过自己有这种能力。

subclassFeature.name: Rallying Cry
entries: 当你在3级选择这个原型时，你学会了如何激励你的盟友在受伤后继续战斗。
当你使用你的 "第二风 "特性时，你可以在你周围60英尺内选择最多三个与你结盟的生物。每个人都会恢复与你的战士等级相等的命中率，前提是该生物能看到或听到你。

subclassFeature.name: Restriction: Knighthood
entries: 紫龙骑士与科米勒的一个特定骑士团联系在一起。
如果你在其他战役环境中使用这个原型，或者为紫龙骑士以外的军阀建模，那么班纳特可以作为这个原型的通用名称。

subclassFeature.name: Royal Envoy
entries: 紫龙骑士充当科米雷亚王室的特使。享有崇高地位的骑士被期望以优雅的方式行事。

At 7th level, you gain proficiency in the {@skill Persuasion} skill. If you are already proficient in it, you gain proficiency in one of the following skills of your choice: {@skill Animal Handling}, {@skill Insight}, {@skill Intimidation}, or {@skill Performance}.
Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses {@skill Persuasion}. You receive this benefit regardless of the skill proficiency you gain from this feature.

subclassFeature.name: Inspiring Surge
entries: 从10级开始，当你使用你的行动突进功能时，你可以在你周围60英尺内选择一个与你结盟的生物。该生物可以用其反应进行一次近战或远程武器攻击，前提是它能看到或听到你。
从18级开始，你可以选择60英尺内的两个盟友，而不是一个。

subclassFeature.name: Bulwark
entries: Beginning at 15th level, you can extend the benefit of your Indomitable feature to an ally. When you decide to use Indomitable to reroll an Intelligence, a Wisdom, or a Charisma saving throw and you aren't {@condition incapacitated}, you can choose one ally within 60 feet of you that also failed its saving throw against the same effect. If that creature can see or hear you, it can reroll its saving throw and must use the new roll.

subclassFeature.name: Inspiring Surge
entries: 从18级开始，你可以选择60英尺内的两个盟友，而不是一个。

subclassFeature.name: Psi Warrior
entries: Awake to the psionic power within, a Psi Warrior is a fighter who augments their physical might with psi-infused weapon strikes, telekinetic lashes, and barriers of mental force. Many githyanki train to become such warriors, as do some of the most disciplined high elves. In the world of Eberron, many young kalashtar dream of becoming Psi Warriors.
作为一名灵媒战士，你可能已经通过单人修炼磨练了你的灵媒能力，在大师的指导下解锁了它，或者在一所致力于将心灵的力量作为武器和盾牌挥舞的学院里完善了它。

subclassFeature.name: Psionic Power
entries: {@i 3rd-level Psi Warrior feature}

You harbor a wellspring of psionic energy within yourself. This energy is represented by your Psionic Energy dice, which are each a {@dice d6}. You have a number of these dice equal to twice your proficiency bonus, and they fuel various psionic powers you have, which are detailed below.
你的一些能力会消耗他们所使用的幻能骰子，这在能力的描述中有所说明，如果一个能力要求你在你的骰子都被消耗掉时使用骰子，你就不能使用这个能力。当你完成一个长时间的休息时，你会重新获得你所有消耗的幻能骰子。此外，作为一个额外的动作，你可以重新获得一个已消耗的幻能骰子，但在你完成短时或长时休息之前，你不能再次这样做。
When you reach certain levels in this class, the size of your Psionic Energy dice increases: at 5th level ({@dice d8}), 11th level ({@dice d10}), and 17th level ({@dice d12}).
下面的力量使用你的幻觉能量骰子。

subclassFeature.name: Telekinetic Adept
entries: {@i 7th-level Psi Warrior feature}
你已经掌握了使用心灵感应能力的新方法，详情如下。

subclassFeature.name: Guarded Mind
entries: {@i 10th-level Psi Warrior feature}

The psionic energy flowing through you has bolstered your mind. You have resistance to psychic damage. Moreover, if you start your turn {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}, you can expend a Psionic Energy die and end every effect on yourself subjecting you to those conditions.

subclassFeature.name: Bulwark of Force
entries: {@i 15th-level Psi Warrior feature}

You can shield yourself and others with telekinetic force. As a bonus action, you can choose creatures, which can include you, that you can see within 30 feet of you, up to a number of creatures equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of one creature). Each of the chosen creatures is protected by half cover for 1 minute or until you're {@condition incapacitated}.
Once you take this bonus action, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest, unless you expend a Psionic Energy die to take it again.

subclassFeature.name: Telekinetic Master
entries: {@i 18th-level Psi Warrior feature}

Your ability to move creatures and objects with your mind is matched by few. You can cast the {@spell telekinesis} spell, requiring no components, and your spellcasting ability for the spell is Intelligence. On each of your turns while you concentrate on the spell, including the turn when you cast it, you can make one attack with a weapon as a bonus action.
Once you cast the spell with this feature, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest, unless you expend a Psionic Energy die to cast it again.

subclassFeature.name: Rune Knight
entries: Rune Knights enhance their martial prowess using the supernatural power of runes, an ancient practice that originated with giants. Rune cutters can be found among any family of giants, and you likely learned your methods first or second hand from such a mystical artisan. Whether you found the giant's work carved into a hill or cave, learned of the runes from a sage, or met the giant in person, you studied the giant's craft and learned how to apply magic runes to empower your equipment.

subclassFeature.name: Bonus Proficiencies
entries: {@i 3rd-level Rune Knight feature}
You gain proficiency with {@item smith's tools|PHB}, and you learn to speak, read, and write {@language Giant}.

subclassFeature.name: Giant's Might
entries: {@i 3rd-level Rune Knight feature}
You have learned how to imbue yourself with the might of giants. As a bonus action, you magically gain the following benefits, which last for 1 minute:

items: If you are smaller than Large, you become Large, along with anything you are wearing. If you lack the room to become Large, your size doesn't change.
You have advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws.
Once on each of your turns, one of your attacks with a weapon or an unarmed strike can deal an extra {@damage 1d6} damage to a target on a hit.

entries: You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses of it when you finish a long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Rune Carver
entries: {@i 3rd-level Rune Knight feature}

You can use magic runes to enhance your gear. You learn two runes of your choice, from among the runes described below, and each time you gain a level in this class, you can replace one rune you know with a different one from this feature. When you reach certain levels in this class, you learn additional runes, as shown in the Runes Known table.

Whenever you finish a long rest, you can touch a number of objects equal to the number of runes you know, and you inscribe a different rune onto each of the objects. To be eligible, an object must be a weapon, a suit of armor, a shield, a piece of jewelry, or something else you can wear or hold in a hand. Your rune remains on an object until you finish a long rest, and an object can bear only one of your runes at a time.

entries.caption: Runes Known
rows: 3rd
7th
10th
15th

entries: The following runes are available to you when you learn a rune. If a rune has a level requirement, you must be at least that level in this class to learn the rune. If a rune requires a saving throw, your Rune Magic save DC equals 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Constitution modifier.

subclassFeature.name: Additional Rune Known
entries: {@i 7th-level Rune Knight feature}
You learn an additional Rune.

subclassFeature.name: Runic Shield
entries: {@i 7th-level Rune Knight feature}

You learn to invoke your rune magic to protect your allies. When another creature you can see within 60 feet of you is hit by an attack roll, you can use your reaction to force the attacker to reroll the {@dice d20} and use the new roll.
You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Additional Rune Known
entries: {@i 10th-level Rune Knight feature}
You learn an additional Rune.

subclassFeature.name: Great Stature
entries: {@i 10th-level Rune Knight feature}
The magic of your runes permanently alters you. When you gain this feature, roll {@dice 3d4}. You grow a number of inches in height equal to the roll.
Moreover, the extra damage you deal with your Giant's Might feature increases to {@dice 1d8}.

subclassFeature.name: Additional Rune Known
entries: {@i 15th-level Rune Knight feature}
You learn an additional Rune.

subclassFeature.name: Master of Runes
entries: {@i 15th-level Rune Knight feature}
You can invoke each rune you know from your Rune Carver feature twice, rather than once, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a short or long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Runic Juggernaut
entries: {@i 18th-level Rune Knight feature}

You learn how to amplify your rune-powered transformation. As a result, the extra damage you deal with the Giant's Might feature increases to {@dice 1d10}. Moreover, when you use that feature, your size can increase to Huge, and while you are that size, your reach increases by 5 feet.

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Archer
entries: An Arcane Archer studies a unique elven method of archery that weaves magic into attacks to produce supernatural effects. Arcane Archers are some of the most elite warriors among the elves. They stand watch over the fringes of elven domains, keeping a keen eye out for trespassers and using magic-infused arrows to defeat monsters and invaders before they can reach elven settlements. Over the centuries, the methods of these elf archers have been learned by members of other races who can also balance arcane aptitude with archery.

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Archer Lore
entries: At 3rd level, you learn magical theory or some of the secrets of nature—typical for practitioners of this elven martial tradition. You choose to gain proficiency in either the {@skill Arcana} or the {@skill Nature} skill, and you choose to learn either the {@spell prestidigitation} or the {@spell druidcraft} cantrip.

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Shot
entries: At 3rd level, you learn to unleash special magical effects with some of your shots. When you gain this feature, you learn two Arcane Shot options of your choice (see "Arcane Shot Options" below).

Once per turn when you fire an arrow from a shortbow or longbow as part of the {@action Attack} action, you can apply one of your Arcane Shot options to that arrow. You decide to use the option when the arrow hits a creature, unless the option doesn't involve an attack roll. You have two uses of this ability, and you regain all expended uses of it when you finish a short or long rest.
You gain an additional Arcane Shot option of your choice when you reach certain levels in this class: 7th, 10th, 15th, and 18th level. Each option also improves when you become an 18th-level fighter.

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Shot Options
entries: The Arcane Shot feature lets you choose options for it at certain levels. The options are presented here in alphabetical order. They are all magical effects, and each one is associated with one of the schools of magic.
If an option requires a saving throw, your Arcane Shot save DC is calculated as follows:

subclassFeature.name: Additional Arcane Shot Option
entries: You gain an additional Arcane Shot option of your choice when you reach 7th level.

subclassFeature.name: Curving Shot
entries: At 7th level, you learn how to direct an errant arrow toward a new target. When you make an attack roll with a magic arrow and miss, you can use a bonus action to reroll the attack roll against a different target within 60 feet of the original target.

subclassFeature.name: Magic Arrow
entries: At 7th level, you gain the ability to infuse arrows with magic. Whenever you fire a nonmagical arrow from a shortbow or longbow, you can make it magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage. The magic fades from the arrow immediately after it hits or misses its target.

subclassFeature.name: Additional Arcane Shot Option
entries: You gain an additional Arcane Shot option of your choice when you reach 10th level.

subclassFeature.name: Additional Arcane Shot Option
entries: You gain an additional Arcane Shot option of your choice when you reach 15th level.

subclassFeature.name: Ever-Ready Shot
entries: Starting at 15th level, your magical archery is available whenever battle starts. If you roll initiative and have no uses of Arcane Shot remaining, you regain one use of it.

subclassFeature.name: Additional Arcane Shot Option
entries: You gain an additional Arcane Shot option of your choice when you reach 18th level. Each option also improves when you become an 18th-level fighter.

subclassFeature.name: Cavalier
entries: The archetypal Cavalier excels at mounted combat. Usually born among the nobility and raised at court, a Cavalier is equally at home leading a cavalry charge or exchanging repartee at a state dinner. Cavaliers also learn how to guard those in their charge from harm, often serving as the protectors of their superiors and of the weak. Compelled to right wrongs or earn prestige, many of these fighters leave their lives of comfort to embark on glorious adventure.

subclassFeature.name: Bonus Proficiency
entries: When you choose this archetype at 3rd level, you gain proficiency in one of the following skills of your choice: {@skill Animal Handling}, {@skill History}, {@skill Insight}, {@skill Performance}, or {@skill Persuasion}. Alternatively, you learn one language of your choice.

subclassFeature.name: Born to the Saddle
entries: Starting at 3rd level, your mastery as a rider becomes apparent. You have advantage on saving throws made to avoid falling off your mount. If you fall off your mount and descend no more than 10 feet, you can land on your feet if you're not {@condition incapacitated}.
Finally, mounting or dismounting a creature costs you only 5 feet of movement, rather than half your speed.

subclassFeature.name: Unwavering Mark
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you can menace your foes, foiling their attacks and punishing them for harming others. When you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack, you can mark the creature until the end of your next turn. This effect ends early if you are {@condition incapacitated} or you die, or if someone else marks the creature.
While it is within 5 feet of you, a creature marked by you has disadvantage on any attack roll that doesn't target you.

In addition, if a creature marked by you deals damage to anyone other than you, you can make a special melee weapon attack against the marked creature as a bonus action on your next turn. You have advantage on the attack roll, and if it hits, the attack's weapon deals extra damage to the target equal to half your fighter level.

Regardless of the number of creatures you mark, you can make this special attack a number of times equal to your Strength modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses of it when you finish a long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Warding Maneuver
entries: At 7th level, you learn to fend off strikes directed at you, your mount, or other creatures nearby. If you or a creature you can see within 5 feet of you is hit by an attack, you can roll {@dice 1d8} as a reaction if you're wielding a melee weapon or a shield. Roll the die, and add the number rolled to the target's AC against that attack. If the attack still hits, the target has resistance against the attack's damage.
You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Constitution modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses of it when you finish a long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Hold the Line
entries: At 10th level, you become a master of locking down your enemies. Creatures provoke an opportunity attack from you when they move 5 feet or more while within your reach, and if you hit a creature with an opportunity attack, the target's speed is reduced to 0 until the end of the current turn.

subclassFeature.name: Ferocious Charger
entries: Starting at 15th level, you can run down your foes, whether you're mounted or not. If you move at least 10 feet in a straight line right before attacking a creature and you hit it with the attack, that target must succeed on a Strength saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Strength modifier) or be knocked {@condition prone}. You can use this feature only once on each of your turns.

subclassFeature.name: Vigilant Defender
entries: Starting at 18th level, you respond to danger with extraordinary vigilance. In combat, you get a special reaction that you can take once on every creature's turn, except your turn. You can use this special reaction only to make an opportunity attack, and you can't use it on the same turn that you take your normal reaction.

subclassFeature.name: Samurai
entries: The Samurai is a fighter who draws on an implacable fighting spirit to overcome enemies. A Samurai's resolve is nearly unbreakable, and the enemies in a Samurai's path have two choices: yield or die fighting.

subclassFeature.name: Bonus Proficiency
entries: When you choose this archetype at 3rd level, you gain proficiency in one of the following skills of your choice: {@skill History}, {@skill Insight}, {@skill Performance}, or {@skill Persuasion}. Alternatively, you learn one language of your choice.

subclassFeature.name: Fighting Spirit
entries: Starting at 3rd level, your intensity in battle can shield you and help you strike true. As a bonus action on your turn, you can give yourself advantage on weapon attack rolls until the end of the current turn. When you do so, you also gain 5 temporary hit points. The number of temporary hit points increases when you reach certain levels in this class, increasing to 10 at 10th level and 15 at 15th level.
You can use this feature three times, and you regain all expended uses of it when you finish a long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Elegant Courtier
entries: Starting at 7th level, your discipline and attention to detail allow you to excel in social situations. Whenever you make a Charisma ({@skill Persuasion}) check, you gain a bonus to the check equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Your self-control also causes you to gain proficiency in Wisdom saving throws. If you already have this proficiency, you instead gain proficiency in Intelligence or Charisma saving throws (your choice).

subclassFeature.name: Tireless Spirit
entries: Starting at 10th level, when you roll initiative and have no uses of Fighting Spirit remaining, you regain one use.

subclassFeature.name: Rapid Strike
entries: Starting at 15th level, you learn to trade accuracy for swift strikes. If you take the {@action Attack} action on your turn and have advantage on an attack roll against one of the targets, you can forgo the advantage for that roll to make an additional weapon attack against that target, as part of the same action. You can do so no more than once per turn.

subclassFeature.name: Strength before Death
entries: Starting at 18th level, your fighting spirit can delay the grasp of death. If you take damage that reduces you to 0 hit points and doesn't kill you outright, you can use your reaction to delay falling {@condition unconscious}, and you can immediately take an extra turn, interrupting the current turn. While you have 0 hit points during that extra turn, taking damage causes death saving throw failures as normal, and three death saving throw failures can still kill you. When the extra turn ends, you fall {@condition unconscious} if you still have 0 hit points.
Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Protective Field
entries: When you or another creature you can see within 30 feet of you takes damage, you can use your reaction to expend one Psionic Energy die, roll the die, and reduce the damage taken by the number rolled plus your Intelligence modifier (minimum reduction of 1), as you create a momentary shield of telekinetic force.

subclassFeature.name: Psionic Strike
entries: You can propel your weapons with psionic force. Once on each of your turns, immediately after you hit a target within 30 feet of you with an attack and deal damage to it with a weapon, you can expend one Psionic Energy die, rolling it and dealing force damage to the target equal to the number rolled plus your Intelligence modifier.

subclassFeature.name: Telekinetic Movement
entries: You can move an object or a creature with your mind. As an action, you target one loose object that is Large or smaller or one willing creature, other than yourself. If you can see the target and it is within 30 feet of you, you can move it up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see. Alternatively, if it is a Tiny object, you can move it to or from your hand. Either way, you can move the target horizontally, vertically, or both. Once you take this action, you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest, unless you expend a Psionic Energy die to take it again.

subclassFeature.name: Psi-Powered Leap
entries: As a bonus action, you can propel your body with your mind. You gain a flying speed equal to twice your walking speed until the end of the current turn. Once you take this bonus action, you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest, unless you expend a Psionic Energy die to take it again.

subclassFeature.name: Telekinetic Thrust
entries: When you deal damage to a target with your Psionic Strike, you can force the target to make a Strength saving throw against a DC equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Intelligence modifier. If the save fails, you can knock the target {@condition prone} or move it up to 10 feet in any direction horizontally.
